Name: Military Grade Pilot Interface
Rules: When ~ enters the battlefield choose an asset to attach it to.\nIf the attached asset or an effect choosing it would create a psychosis card٫ that card is not created. \n[T]: The attached asset٫ until end of turn٫ becomes <u>Virtual</u> (Virtual cards can only interact with and choose other Virtual cards [this includes commanders].).

Name: Peacekeeper Rifle
Rules: <u>Ammo 4</u> (Whenever the attached asset attacks or intercepts٫ reduce ~'s ammo by 1 [to a minimum of 0.] Instead of firing an ammo you may treat ~ as if it had ammo 0 until end of turn.)٫ <u>Gun</u> (As long as ~ has ammo remaining٫ the attached asset is ranged.)\nWhen ~ enters٫ choose an asset to attach it to.\nAs long as ~ has ammo remaining٫ the attached asset gets +2/+0 and <u>Brutal</u> (It attacks before assets without Brutal).

Name: Karl Baade٫ Peacekeeper General
Rules: (Becomes `UN War Production` if you already control ~@.)\nAs Commander -- Whenever an Explicitly Female (It must say Female in its type.) asset resolves٫ until end of turn٫ combatants you control get +1/+1.\nAs Asset -- Combatants you control have Inexhaustible (Attacking and intercepting for the first time each turn doesn't utilize them.).

Name: UN War Production
Rules:
<u>Prepare 2 -- [O][O][O]</u> (Pay [O][O][O] and put ~ into your deck second from the top. When you would draw ~٫ instead deploy it without paying its cost.)٫ <u>Decision</u> (You may choose one or more٫ this card's cost is the sum total of its base cost plus all decisions made. Choose one if you prepared.)
-> <u>Build Machines -- [O][O][O][O][+]</u> Create a `Phalanx Assault Drone` in your hand.
-> <u>Train Pilots -- [O][O][+]</u> Create a `Peacekeeper Pilot` in your hand.
<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Karl Baade٫ Peacekeeper General` back into your deck.)

Name: Peacekeeper Pilot
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Military Grade Pilot Interface`</u> (~ enters with a `Military Grade Pilot Interface` attached.)٫ <u>Armed -- `Peacekeeper Rifle`</u> (~ enters with a `Peacekeeper Rifle` attached.)\nAfter each combat ~ is used to Remote Control you may pay the Remote Controlled assets cost to ready ~.

Name: Peacekeeper Mechanic
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Peacekeeper Rifle`</u> (~ enters with a `Peacekeeper Rifle` attached.)\nWhenever a drone you control would die٫ you may instead <u>Forfeit</u> (Put the specified card into your discard pile.) ~ to٫ until end of turn٫ set the drone aside (it's health is refilled normally at the end of the turn).

Name: Phalanx Assault Drone
Rules: <u>Flying</u>٫ <u>Remote Controlled</u>٫ <u>Formation - Attack Front X (X is the number of ~ on the battlefield)٫ Back 2</u> (Cards with Formation have their ranged status determined by their place in their formation; a formation consists of a mandatory melee card at the front and up to two ranged cards at the back. The attack power of the formation is the sum of all combatants in the formation. Combat damage is dealt to the front combatant before the back combatants. Formations can only be formed anytime you could reorganize units.)

Name: Peacekeeper Waylay
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\n~ costs [17] less to deploy if an opponent deployed a combatant this turn.\nChoose a combatant to get +1/+1 for each readied combatant on your frontline.

Name: Xiaomao Zhao٫ BRICS Commander
Rules: (Becomes `Hunker Down and Wait For Reinforcements` if you already control ~@.) Armor 3 (Negate the first 3 damage ~@ would take each turn. When you do permanently reduce ~@'s armor by 1.) As Commander -- Whenever an asset you control enters the battlefield you may pay [V][V][+] if you do it gains Armor X (X is half its Generalized Cost rounded up). As Asset -- The first time an asset you control would run out of ammo٫ refill its ammo.

Name: Hunker Down and Wait For Reinforcements
Rules: If an opponent deployed a non-combatant card this turn٫ ~ costs [4] less. \nCombatants you control٫ until end of turn٫ gain <u>Armor [X]</u> (Negate the first [X] damage they would take each turn. When you do permanently reduce its armor by 1.). If [X] is [4] or more you may put an asset from your hand onto the battlefield and refill the ammo of all of your assets.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Xiaomao Zhao٫ BRICS Commander` back into your deck.)

Name: BRICS Pilot
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Military Grade Pilot Interface`</u> (~ enters with a `Military Grade Pilot Interface` attached.)٫ <u>Armed -- `Ballistic Pistol`</u> (~ enters with a `Ballistic Pistol` attached.)٫ <u>Armor 4</u> (Negate the first 4 damage ~@ would take each turn. When you do permanently reduce ~@'s armor by 1.)

Name: BRICS Mechanic
Rules: <u>Armed -- `Ballistic Pistol`</u> (~ enters with a `Ballistic Pistol` attached.)\n[T]٫ [2][V][V]: Choose an asset you control to have all its ammo restored.

Name: Barricade Drone
Rules: <u>Ammo 4</u>٫ <u>Barricade</u> (Intercepting does not exhaust ~.)٫ <u>Remote Controlled</u> (~ is not a combatant. You may choose a Virtual asset you control to utilize. If you do٫ until end of turn٫ ~ becomes a combatant٫ then shuffle a `Psychosis` into your deck.)٫ <u>Armor 4</u> (Negate the first 4 damage ~@ would take each turn. When you do permanently reduce ~@'s armor by 1.)\n~'s attack power is equal to its ammo.

Name: Impromptu Reinforcement
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\nChoose a combatant to٫ until end of turn٫ gain <u>Armor 5</u> (Negate the first 5 damage it would take each turn. When you do permanently reduce it's armor by 1.).

Name: Prototype Pseudo-Bipedal Assault Drone
Rules: (Becomes `Pseudo-Bipedal Cannon` if you already control ~.)\n<u>Ammo 10</u>٫ <u>Inexhaustible</u> (Attacking and intercepting for the first time each turn doesn't utilize ~.)٫ <u>Remote Controlled</u> (~ is not a combatant. You may choose a Virtual asset you control to utilize. If you do٫ until end of turn٫ ~ becomes a combatant٫ then shuffle a `Psychosis` into your deck.)\n~'s attack power is equal to its ammo.

Name: Pseudo-Bipedal Cannon
Rules: <u>Permanence</u> (Damage that ~ deals is not removed at end of turn.)\nConsume X of `Pseudo-Bipedal Assault Drone`'s Ammo٫ choose a combatant on the frontline to take X damage. Then deal 1 damage to each combatant adjacent to it.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Prototype Pseudo-Bipedal Assault Drone` back into your deck.)

Name: Namibian Mother Load
Rules: (~ can not be utilized for energy.)\nOnce per turn٫ whenever you could reorganize units you may utilize any number of combatants to create X `Saving`s in your hand (X is the number of combatants utilized).

Name: Battle for the Mother Load
Rules: (Becomes `Namibian Mother Load` if you already control ~.) Discovery (When ~ enters the battlefield or at the beginning of your turn٫ progress to the next phase unless the final phase has been reached.) 1-2) Search your deck for a Drone٫ then shuffle٫ and put it on top. Final) Remove all `Namibian Mother Load`s on the battlefield from the game. Forfeit (Put the specified card into your discard pile.) ~.

Name: Fully Automatic Assault Rifle
Rules: <u>Ammo 30</u>٫ <u>Gun</u> (As long as ~ has ammo remaining٫ the attached asset is ranged.)٫ <u>Tradeable</u> (Once each turn while reorganizing units٫ you may pay ~'s cost٫ if you do choose another asset to attach ~ to.)\nWhen ~ enters٫ choose an asset to attach it to.\n3 Ammo: the attached asset can attack twice this turn before being utilized.

Name: Peace٫ Namibia Resistance Leader
Rules:
(Becomes `For the Greater Good` if you already control ~.)
<u>Armed -- `Fully Automatic Assault Rifle`</u> (~ enters with a `Fully Automatic Assault Rifle` attached.)٫ <u>Subterfuge</u> (Cards can't be drawn whenever ~@ is attacking.)
Whenever ~ attacks he permanently gets +1/+0.
~ is also named `Namibia Resistance Fighter`.

Name: For the Greater Good
Rules: Each player <u>Forfeit</u>s (Put the specified cards into their owners' discard pile.) a card on their battlefield.\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Peace٫ Namibia Resistance Leader` back into your deck.)

Name: Patji٫ The Namibia Resistance's Only Pilot
Rules: (Becomes `Legless but not Useless` if you already control ~.)\n<u>Armed -- `Full Dive Pod`</u> (~@ enters with a `Full Dive Pod` attached.)٫ <u>Firewall [2]</u> (~@ can't be chosen unless the choosing player pays [2])٫ <u>Subterfuge</u> (Cards can't be drawn whenever ~@ is attacking.)\nWhenever ~ is used to Remote Control٫ until end of turn٫ the Remote Controlled asset gains all of ~@'s keyword abilities.

Name: Legless but not Useless
Rules: <u>Response</u> (You may deploy ~ during response windows.)\n<u>Order or Vitality Hack</u> (Choose an Order or Vitality card on the stack٫ send it to its owner's discard pile٫ none of its effects occur.)\n<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Patji٫ The Namibia Resistance's Only Pilot ` back into your deck.)

Name: Junkyard UAV
Rules: <u>Remote Controlled</u> (~ is not a combatant. You may choose a Virtual asset you control to utilize. If you do٫ until end of turn٫ ~ becomes a combatant٫ then shuffle a `Psychosis` into your deck.)٫ <u>Flying</u>\nWhenever ~ attacks or intercepts <u>Stun</u> (The next time it would be readied instead it isn't.) it.

Name: Namibia Resistance Fighter
Rules: You may pay [U][U][U][U][+] for ~ to enter with a `Fully Automatic Assault Rifle` attached.\nStrength in Numbers -- Whenever ~ attacks you may choose another combatant (even on the back line) to attack with it٫ until end of turn٫ both combatants get +X/+0 (X is the number of other ~'s that have attacked this turn).

Name: Reload
Rules: Choose a Gun to restore all its ammo.

Name: Desert Rat
Rules: <u>Subterfuge</u> (Cards can't be drawn whenever ~@ is attacking.)\nWhenever ~ attacks it permanently gets +1/+0 unless it has attack power 3 or greater.

Name: I'm Sorry I Couldn't Save Her Legs
Rules:
<u>Decision</u> (You may choose one or more٫ this card's cost is the sum total of its base cost plus all decisions made.)
-> <u>Reckless Driving -- [M][M][+]</u> Choose an asset to permanently gain Rush (That asset can attack before it has finished deploying.)
-> <u>She Was Too Slow -- [2][+]</u> Choose an asset to permanently gain <u>Sluggish</u> (That asset attacks after assets without Sluggish.).
-> <u>Swear Revenge -- [U][U][+]</u> Choose an asset to permanently gain <u>Brutal</u> (That asset attacks after assets without Brutal.)

Name: Peace and Patji٫ Foreign Exchange Students
Rules: (Becomes `"Peaceful" Foreign Student Life` if you already control ~@.)\n<u>Subterfuge</u> (Cards can't be drawn whenever ~@ is attacking.)\nWhenever you resolve a Study card shuffle a `Namibia Resistance Fighter` into your deck.

Name: "Peaceful" Foreign Student Life
Rules:
<u>Decision</u> (You may choose one or more٫ this card's cost is the sum total of its base cost plus all decisions made.)
-> <u>Study Mechanical Engineering -- [U][U][+]</u> Choose a Mechanical (Vehicles٫ Augmented٫ Drones٫ and Equipment are all Mechanical) asset to permanently get +1/+0.
-> <u>Study Computer Science -- [I][I][I][I][+]</u> Choose a Virtual card to kill.
<u>Personal</u> (Shuffle `Peace and Patji٫ Foreign Exchange Students` back into your deck.)

Name: High-Explosive Grenade
Rules: When ~ enters the battlefield٫ you may attach it to a combatant.\n<u>Throw</u> (Activate this ability only if attached to a combatant.)٫<u>Forfeit</u> (Put the specified card into its owner's discard.) ~: Choose a combatant on the frontline to return to its owner's hand٫ it permanently looses <u>Armor</u>. ~ deals 2 damage to each combatant adjacent to the chosen combatant.\n<u>Forfeit</u> ~: Add [V][V][V][V][V][V].
